unnormalised: Flash sales, huh? More like "flash-in-the-pan sales"! They disappear faster than my appam on Onam. Suddenly everyone's a cheetah, refreshing the page like they're trying to book a Tatkal ticket to Kerala. My wallet's crying louder than a Bollywood drama. Rs. 50 off? It's all maya, yaar!
normalised: Flash sales, huh? More like "flash in the pan sales"! They disappear faster than my appam on Onam. Suddenly everyone's a cheetah, refreshing the page like they're trying to book a Tatkal ticket to Kerala. My wallet's crying louder than a Bollywood drama. Rupee fifty off? It's all maya, yaar!
